tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_hearings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    speaker_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE public_hearings (
	hearing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	hearing_date DATE,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	hearing_topic VARCHAR(255),
	hearing_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE town_hall_meetings (
	meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	meeting_date DATE,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	meeting_topic VARCHAR(255),
	meeting_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE town_hall_meetings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    organizer VARCHAR(255),
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE public_hearings (
    hearing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hearing_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    topic VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hearing_id INT,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    organization VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hearing_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hearing_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE hearings (
    hearing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hearing_title VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    organization VARCHAR(255),
    hearing_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (hearing_id) REFERENCES hearings(hearing_id)
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    comment_text TEXT,
    participant_id INT,
    hearing_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (hearing_id) REFERENCES hearings(hearing_id)
);
